: : Kup : :
Kup remained in the war room. He watched the battle on the monitors incase he would be needed. He also kept an optic on the kids as they went to the mess hall.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:Cam::

She took the baby and looked up at Kup. "I have to be a big bot now 
huh?"  She took the baby to the mess hall and looked for something 
for the baby to eat.  She went to the energon synthisizer and had a 
bottle of energon made up for the baby. She sat down and gave it to 
the baby. "You just keep quiet and this may work out." she said with 
a smile on her face, glad to be one of the big bots.




--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> 
> : : Kup : :
> Kup jumped to his feet, leading the young transformers. He took Cam 
and Elita to the center of the base, which he thought would be the 
safest place. It was the war room.
> Kup: Cam, I need you to follow orders here. I know your young, but 
your now a member of this group, a soldier in war. I need you to just 
keep that baby, and yourself safe. Those are your orders. Understood?
> Kup got his plasma rifle from subspace and began to look over it. 
He made sure it was fully loaded before cocking it.
> Kup: I may have to leave to fight.
> Kup then activates a computer terminal.
> Kup: Computer, activate autodefences. Shields to full, and all 
autoguns online. I want the autoguns to fire their most destructive 
blasts. Seal off the ship and only allow authorized entrence. 
Authorization code: Security Chief Kup, code 58262005 epsilon! Red 
alert!
> The computer acknolwleges the commands in beeps. The ships loghting 
went to a dark red as alarms sounded. The base sealed off. The 
shields became so strong that they could be seen even when weapons 
wern't striking them. Every autogun the ship had came out and began 
to fire on the Predacons. Every shot was like a small explosive.
>  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:Camoflage::
> She sighed and follwed Kup. "At least it stopped crying. I just 
hope 
> I didn't hurt it any. I tried to feed it and make it feel better. 
But 
> I don't know anything about babies."
> 
> Battera::
> She nodded to Windlord. "I understand. Please, I am still 
functional. 
> You will get me if you are in need of help." With that, she made 
her 
> way to the CR chamber. Once there in the chamber room, she climbed 
in 
> and let the maintenance bots help heal her wounds.
> 
> KitKat::
> She growled, hopped, jumped, leaped, ducked, rolled and twisted out 
> of the way of Windlords shots. She sneered and fired her own 
25shotws 
> back at them. She looked t Desctructor,"I think we should find 
cover 
> soon. Or else we will start to look like swiss energon." She looked 
> at Rodimus, "Can we get around to thier soft spot and attack from 
> another location that might do more damage?"
> 
> 
> 
> -- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Windlord/Elita:
> > 
> > Elita saw Cam cry and licked her as if she tried to confort her, 
> then 
> > Windlrd took the baby in arms and rock her. Elita started to calm 
> > down and fall sleep.
> > 
> > "She likes you, Cam" said kindly Windlord "She just is a little 
> > annoyed 'cause she likes sleep."
> > 
> > When Winlord was ready to speak the shots fell close them "By all 
> > hawks... Predacons are visiting us,... Kup, Take the childrens 
and 
> > care them... Cam, stay with Kup and care the baby... Owl hawk 
left 
> > Aeroatuor in CR and reach me... I'll need a hand... Battera, take 
a 
> > rest in CRs...   "
> > 
> > Windlor gave elita to Kup and ran towards Destructor and Kitkat.
> > 
> > "SHIELDS UP!!!!!" screamed the male.
> > 
> > after that the shields araised and Windlord shot 10 shots against 
> > Destructor and 15 against Kitkat
> > 
> > 
> >
>
